virtual void MeshSet_GetChildren (  const Mesh *    mesh,
cMeshSet_Handle    from_meshset,
const int    num_hops,
int *    num_sets,
MeshSet_Handle **    set_handles,
MeshError *    errorReturn
)  const [pure virtual]
 

get relations between sets; assumes hierarchical (parent/child) relationships; if num_hops = -1, gets *all* parents or children over all hops.
